mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1)AS mc FROM r_menu m
SELECT m.ID AS id, m.MENUCODE AS CODE, m.MENUNAME AS NAME, m.URLTYPE AS urltype, m.MENUURL AS url, m.STATUS AS status FROM r_menu m

( SELECT concat('m_',m.ID) AS id, m.MENUNAME AS NAME, IF(m.PARENTID IS NULL OR m.PARENTID='0','0',concat('m_',m.PARENTID)) AS pId, 'true' AS OPEN, 'true' AS parent,
IF ( rm.ROLEID IS NOT NULL AND rm.ROLEID <> '', 'true', 'false' ) AS checked FROM r_menu m LEFT JOIN r_role_menu rm ON ( m.ID = rm.MENUID AND rm.ROLEID = #{roleid} ) WHERE m.SYSTEMID = #{systemid} AND m.`STATUS` <> 'D' ORDER BY m.SORT ) UNION ALL ( SELECT concat('mi_',mi.ID) AS id, mi.ITEMNAME AS NAME, concat('m_',mi.MENUID) AS pId, 'false' AS OPEN, 'false' AS parent,

STATUS <> 'D' AND mi. STATUS <> 'D' ORDER BY m.SORT )
